name: obsidian-mcp
description: MCP server providing AI agents with read/write access to Obsidian vaults via the official CLI
author: Fedor Ryzhenkov

tools.name: obsidian_vault
tools.description: Get vault info or list all vaults

tools.name: obsidian_files
tools.description: List files/folders or get info on specific items

tools.name: obsidian_write
tools.description: Write or replace full file content

tools.name: obsidian_create
tools.description: Create new file with optional template

tools.name: obsidian_tags
tools.description: List tags or find notes by tag

tools.name: obsidian_daily
tools.description: Read or modify today's daily note

tools.name: obsidian_links
tools.description: Analyze backlinks, outgoing links, orphans, unresolved links, deadends

tools.name: obsidian_outline
tools.description: Get heading structure of a note

resources.name: vault-file
resources.description: Read a file from the Obsidian vault by path
